displayName: Certificates should have the specified lifetime action triggers
description: Manage your organizational compliance requirements by specifying whether a certificate lifetime action is triggered at a specific percentage of its lifetime or at a certain number of days prior to its expiration.

metadata.description: Enter the percentage of lifetime of the certificate when you want to trigger the policy action. For example, to trigger a policy action at 80% of the certificate's valid life, enter '80'.
Enter the days before expiration of the certificate when you want to trigger the policy action. For example, to trigger a policy action 90 days before the certificate's expiration, enter '90'.
'Audit' allows a non-compliant resource to be created, but flags it as non-compliant. 'Deny' blocks the resource creation. 'Disable' turns off the policy.
